import React from 'react'; import about_us from './assets/coffee_images/coffee_latte.webp'; const About = () => { return (

About Us

Delivering The Best Possible Service


At Compass, our diverse range of flexible food and hospitality services for businesses, venues, sports, leisure and beyond ensure every guest and colleague enjoys a restaurant quality experience, wherever they are.


Our highly trained and motivated bar, waiting and catering staff create a warm and welcoming environment, greeting you with a smile and a range of culinary and drinks options to suit every taste. With an account manager overseeing every site, you can rest assured that any issues that arise will be dealt with quickly and efficiently, freeing you up to concentrate on the things that matter and keeping your business running as smoothly as possible.

) } export default About
